#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define LL long long int
#define sc(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define sl(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define pf(x) printf("%d\n",x)
#define pl(x) printf("%lld\n",x)
#define pb push_back
#define F first
#define S second
#define maxn 1005
#define M 1000000007
using namespace std;


int main ()
{
	int t,n,sum,s1;
	string s[50005];
	sc(t);
	while(t--)
	{
		sc(n);
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>s[i];
		}
		sort(s,s+n);
		s1=1;
		sum=0;
		for(int i=1;i<n;i++)
		{
			//cout<<s[i]<<endl;
			if(s[i]==s[i-1])
			{
				s1++;
			}
			else 
			{
				if(s1&1)
				{
					sum++;
				}
				s1=1;
			}
		}
		if(s1&1)
				{
					sum++;
				}
				pf(sum);
	}
	return 0;
}
